fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you attack a player, you will attempt to kill them.
- If their defense is Basic or lower, you will kill them.
- When you kill a player, they die. Their role and last will is revealed.
- When a player dies, they're dead. This means they cannot vote or use abilities.

||- Your target's *actual* role and will is revealed, and they cannot be cleaned. Also, your target cannot vote or use abilities if they die, even if they normally could. This is for clarification.||
